name: Graph Explorer - No Footer - Hidden Header
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
This will aide you use of the Microsoft Graph Explorer, filling the page with the editor, and removing the annoying things that make it scroll weirdly.
additional_info:
This first version will:
- remove the annoying footer completely
- hide the header until you move the mouse to the top
- expand the left list fully

If you can think of more suggestions for this, let me know. I won't be developing fast, but I'll check in! For example, this will affect other developer sites at MS, so if you've noted breaking stuff, let me know, as it'll probably affect me at some point.

The 'overlay' of the 'hidden header' is optional, if you want to not show that overlayline, then change the expandingBgCol variable in the :root section from:
/*[[headerOverlayColour]]*/
to
#fff0

Either that, or use the Stylish customiser, which doesn't seem to be saving the alpha value of 13 which I put in the settings here. However that achieves the not exactly lovely band on the preview image.

If you want to make a better version, please do!

The second section is purely to separate out the 'deletions' so that they're a bit more functionally apart from the rest. This started as a moz-document domain, and I may move those to that, too.
